name: Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner - Micro Tip
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:
ingredients: Water, Ammonium Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol, Beheneth-30, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone, Propylparaben, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate. May Contain (+/-): Black 2 (Ci 77266) (Nano).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake well before use. .-Sweep pen along lash line. .-Use tip of pen to fill in between lashes for natural definition and a fuller lash line. .-Build to intensify color. .-Use after the original Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner (sold separately) to detail and perfect your look. .-Store horizontally for best performance.

reviews.review_title: Best micro tip in the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the micro tip for natural, every looks. The formula is better than your typical drugstore products, but does not last me the entire night. I've repurchased this product 4 times, I've simply haven't found a better alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On my first use, this product was so disappointing. Barely any ink came out and it was not precise at all. Will never purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail eyeliner. I will not go to any other eyeliner after having this one. I'm on my second one, this one has lasted me for almost a year now. I love the small tip, it gives me so much more control. I wear this every time I work (in a restaurant) and there is no smudging. It stays on. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in the hopes it would be similar to the original Stila liquid eyeliner.  What a disappointment, immediately after applying it has a tendency to run and doesn't stay put under my eyes and on my eyelids. Consistency seems thinner.  I will stick with the original Stila liquid eyeliner for now.  No, I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Love! Don't know how I managed without this liner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this liner! I have shaky hands and attempting cat/siren eyes with any liquid eyeliner would either take forever or end up not as precise as I would have liked- however with the micro tip, I can now easily do the cutest flicks and subtle wings without any issues or too much time. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color, really liquidy, but after about 3 uses I find the product dries out quickly making it harder to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made my eyes itch and didn't stay on.  Going back to KVD.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my most absolute favorite eyeliner. never smudges and lasts all day and night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is top of the tier! The tip is so small and mechanical that it makes doing my eyeliner a breeze. Making the perfect wing, and really getting in there super close to the lash line are very important to me and it's easy with the tip of this liner. Her black, waterproof. The perfect tip. The perfect eyeliner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good, it has a very fine tip and go on smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this eyeliner. i've been using it for over 3 years now and I cant live without it. because of how fine the tip is, its my go to for all my cosplay makeup. i can be super precise when I need to be and have no trouble filling in on thicker, more graphic eyeliner styles as well.  I always set my makeup with the urban decay all nighter settgin spray and I can go for 12+ hours no problem without my eyeliner getting disturbed even through the sweat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because review said it has the most staying power. It lasted for about an hour before it disappeared from my eyelid and the brown was gone even sooner.  Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to eyeliner! The microtip is such a game changer especially for people who can't seem to make the perfect wing. lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does not sting in the eyes, really lasts all day and the micro tip helps me make the line really narrow and sharp compared to the regular tip. Love Stila and have not found a reason to switch to anything else after years of repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smudge proof, precise and stay all day. A 5 star eye liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great eyeliner, sure. But I have so many that work exactly the same or better for half the price. I thought I'd make the jump and try it since its popular but I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely fool proof and stays forever. Will buy over and over again

reviews.review_title: Good for the first few lines!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I came across this in college when my roommate allowed me to use hers while primping for nights out. I loved how smooth, dark, and fine it was.  So, I waited years until I was earning my own $$ and able to afford one for myself. Unfortunately, as an owner, I was less pleased. The marker quickly becomes less smooth with each use, and it's not as buildable (going over the same line just wipes it off rather than making the line darker). I wish the engineering of the pen ensured better and more consistent flow of the liquid.  On the bright side, it is good to use for the first few uses and is indeed waterproof, but easily cleans off with a water-based cleanser. Perfect shape to draw winged eye-lines. Don't forget to give it a shake before using to maximize its use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My eyes are very watery and need a great eyeliner so it doesn't run. I received Stay All Day WaterProof Liquid Eyeliner and it did not disappoint! I wore it all day and had no smudges or run. Definitely, waterproof. Tip was thin and was very easy to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used to be my favorite eyeliner ever. It seems the formula changed and it dries out so quickly now which is super disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST EYELINER EVER. I've tried many, but this eyeliner is great. The tip does not dry out fast, which is always the problem with many of the micro-tip eyeliners I've tried. Though it's not the most waterproof, it's really great and easy to use!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite eyeliner. While I like the original tip, I find drawing wings 100x easier with the micro tip. I use the UD primer potion under it and it stays ALL DAY. I've even slept in it and it stays in place. I have absolutely 0 complaints about this and will continue repurchasing. It is super black too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the micro tip. The liner wears well and will last all day without touch up if you don't rub your eyes.

reviews.review_title: Micro tip yes, but drying out within 2 weeks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm disappointed with this product: I like the size/shape of the tip, but it dried out within 2 weeks of purchase and color wasn't intense black as marketed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product, Its a perfect density and gives a very clean stroke when applied.  I have used multiple black eye liners before but I feel this black color is perfectly opaque and suits best on my brown skin.  I specially love the mirco tip, it helps for the perfect application. The tip is not very smooth nor very hard, its perfect for one stroke application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not u201cstay all dayu201d for me. It does not stay very black and some parts come off completely in a couple of hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite eyeliner ever. I have small eyes, and this fantastic easy to use eyeliner makes it a breeze to create tiny lines by my lashes without using all of my eyelid real estate. I live in Florida, and it stays put all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this eyeliner a couple times and both times the pen dried out within a month. I keep the cap on and didn't use it everyday. When I do use, I would do a thin small wing so not using a ton of product each time. Not sure why it dried out so fast every time but same thing happened to my mom. If you are lucky enough to keep yours inky, it's a decent pigment and I like the tip.

reviews.review_title: THIS REVIEW IS ONLY FOR THE DARK BROWN-
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner has been a staple liner for me for the last decade. Its perfect. I've been waiting SO long for stila to drop the micro tip in brown. However the brown is super orange/red tone. Unfortunately will gave to return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the thin liner, but it's dries up so quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i kinda liked it ! it's a good product but very expensive for what it is . lasted me a while too so 1pt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite liquid eyeliner. I tried to apply on a dry eye not on top of make up. Otherwise, the brush will dry out quickly do to make-up buildup on the tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought one to try to draw bottom lashes and its perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts all day, doesn't smudge, even when I touch my eyes sometimes and honestly don't think I'd even try another black eyeliner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite liquid eyeliner! I love making my eyeliner as sharp and precise as possible so this worked perfectly for me. Lasts me the whole day unless I'm having a breakdown.

reviews.review_title: Stick with the original, skip the micro tip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did not realize that my Sephora now only carries the micro tip- while I absolutely swear by the original Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner by Stila, this one simply DOES. NOT. WORK. The best way I can describe it- it's as if as it is going on, the tip somehow simultaneously pulls some of the pigment off, so I never have a perfect solid line as with the original tip. Wish I wouldn't have wasted the money, it's going in the trash. (Also, thought maybe the micro tip couldn't hold up going on over a light facial lotion- I worried it might have come in contact though I don't get too close to my eyes with my day lotion anyhow- but no. I tried it on completely clean and dried skin and it still doesn't go on even remotely smooth like the other.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applies thinly and stays literally all day. Have to scrub it off, which was what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cried my eyes out on the train, then worked a 10 hour shift, THEN cried again. great eyeliner , didn't smudge and I have oily eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigment, glides on well, and stays put throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The micro tip makes it very hard to do a wing for me. It's too small of a tip, so its harder to make a straight line. Hopefully I will be able to exchange for the regular stila eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hopeful that I had finally found an eyeliner that was waterproof after reading reviews.  My eyes water at times.  This eyeliner ended up smearing and had to be reapplied.

reviews.review_title: best eyeliner out there for oily lids
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: in my experience, this is the best liquid liner of all time. i've tried so many others to try to find a back-up in case this ever gets discontinued and nothing compared. i have oily lids and this is basically the only liner i have that doesn't smudge, transfer, or completely wear off within a few hours. 100/5 stars. have purchased it probably over a hundred times over a decade lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the pigment on this. I go on top of another liner I use to give me a sharper line. However the tip doesn't stay strong. So it rarely gives pigment at the end unless I angle it a certain way and slowly layer. Would recommend this for people who want a basic eye liner look, but maybe not precise lines unless you have the hands of surgeon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is okay. The micro tip is definitely better than the original, but I still had issues with the product drying out at the tip. It makes it almost impossible to create any winged look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointing eye liner. It flaked a lot and was not waterproof. The tip also dried out within 3 months of using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like how its stay dark black , its easy to handle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This micro tip eyeliner from Sila is great to use for the cat-eye or wing look for hooded eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only eyeliner i'll use! Stays perfectly intact even after swimming u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ahhh! i love this eyeliner. i have used this eyeliner ever since i started doing my makeup more regularly, and its a blessing. when people compliment my eyeliner i ALWAYS recommend stila, love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: truly a gem of a liner. So precise and easy to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product!  It's lasts me all day. I was looking for an eyeliner with a fine tip. I give it 4 stars because it does bleed a bit sometimes. Nothing a q-tip can't fix.  I have tried several liquid eyeliners at Sephora and they do not compare to this. This is definitely way better than KVD.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been the best eyeliner for me and creates super precise lines without smudging. Will order again

reviews.review_title: Dries out FAST, didn't even get a weeks worth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The first 5 uses, this was a good eyeliner and what I expected. I dont know if it lasted much longer than comparable liners-KVD tattoo liner for example. But this dried out fast. And I stored it cap down to try to avoid this. I was careful with it. Before I used then 10 times, it was -completely- dried out. Im really disappointed. I read the reviews but hoped this wouldn't happen. This product is really bad now. :( Bummer. I liked it a lot at first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to LOVE this product and have been a loyal user for years now. But I feel like I've gotten much less of a use out of it the last 6mo or so! I've had repurchase it every month and a half because it gets super streaky and dried out so quickly. At first I thought it was just a bad batch but it's consistently happened. I used to be able to get about 3-4mo out of one before! I think they may have changed the formula :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product, the very best eye Liner. It honestly stays all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with oily lids whose ~signature~ look is a cat eye, I am very impressed with this! I use a touch of primer and this liner lasts ALL day without smudging, transferring, or cracking off. The pen is super fine and stiff so you can go subtle or build up for a more dramatic look. I have tried dozens of other liners and was looking for something to replace my go-to after it was discontinued. This outperforms anything I've tried - obsessed!

reviews.review_title: longest-lasting eye liner I have ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: longest-lasting eye liner I have ever tried, it lasts through the day without a primer or a setting medium, i only with it had a more smokey, blend-able property.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive but completely worth it. I needed something for a funeral and this did the trick. I also love the micro tip because of how nice and small I can make the line.

reviews.review_title: BEST WATERPROOF JET BLACK MATTE LINER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best eyeliners, I was looking for a drugstore dupe and I can't find anything as good as this only down side is it doesn't work well with some shimmers but i find a way to make it look amazing regardless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this and was so excited to use it! I love how micro thin the tip is! I don't like thick lines on my upper eyelid. I like the more natural and subtle look so I love being able to just dub a bit of black on my eyeslids. I hope this product doesn't dry out fast and will last awhile. But otherwise, I am loving this so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There's a reason this is a cult-favorite. It does everything everyone says it does. I used to use the Marc jacobs liner until it sold out so I bought this one after reading so much about it and I am SOLD. I will only be buying this liner from now on. It really is intense black and even though the liner is micro thin you can do as thick or thin liner as you want. It has amazing staying power. Other liquid liners tend to pill for me after a few uses but this one lasted all the way to the end of its use! I only bought a new one because I felt the ink was running out after about two months using most days. Good stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eyeliner. It is subtle but effective. Thinner tip than I was expecting, but for someone who likes to keep my makeup look minimal, this was perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent buy for the money.  Great product. I received a free sample and immediately had to go and buy the full product because I loved it so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is so easy to apply, the tip is so skinny and really allows for small lines to be made. It's also very shiny. Super cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first liquid eye liner and I loved it! It's so easy to use for someone who hasn't tried liquid eye liner:) I wasn't waterproof as I expected, so that's the reason of 4star:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is absolutely gorgeous and I slept in it and it still lasted a while, like it wasn't everywhere on my eyelid. I still had to reapply my eyeliner a few times during the day though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Usually lasts around 3-4 weeks for me. I've used this eyeliner daily, for over 2 years. Wish it would work better with some of my shimmer eyeshadows. Overall easy to use and good quality. Just wish it'd last longer, and wouldn't fade on my inner creased eyelid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite eyeliner for years. Perfect size tip for a thin cat eye. Lasts all day and doesn't smudge. The eyeliner itself also lasts long and doesn't dry out.

reviews.review_title: water proof, liquid proof, tear proof
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i cry at least once every day and this eyeliner has yet to even budge. not once has it bled down or been wiped off because of liquid. stays better than any waterproof mascara ive tried (see photo)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Stila eyeliner has a thin tip, which allows you make precise lines on your eyelid. It also dries super quickly, so the product doesn't transfer onto the top of your lid, and has a dark black color (some eyeliners have a grey tint). However, it was slightly difficult to wash off all the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to wait a few weeks to write a review of this product to make sure it was consistent. Previously I was a fan of the cult favorite original version of this liner, with the larger applicator. I took a chance on this version and am 100% converted. Not only does it give you more control in application, but it does not dry out as quickly as the original. I think this may be because the surface area of the micro tip is smaller, limiting the air the product is exposed to when the cap is off.   One annoying aspect of the original version is in the design of the larger applicator. As the product is used up it would dry up the applicator and the product would stop reaching its pointy tip, making precision lining increasingly difficult. This is not an issue with the micro tip. The applicator evenly absorbs and distributes the product. I am obsessed! A must for graphic liner people. I love it so much I don't care how many times I said micro tip or tip in this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this liner for so long and I haven't found one I like better than this! I'm able to get my wings so small due to the microtip which is great for my hooded asian eyes.  I get so many compliments and people asking how I'm able to get it so thin :)  BE WARNED FOR OILY EYELIDS! If I don't prime my eyes/accidentally use too much eye primer and my lids get oily THIS WILL COME OFF AND CREASE. But if you have your life under control then this will do wonders :D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful love this eyeliner for a quick time saving days! Last all day and the pen works for 2-3 months,  only down fall is it will flake threw out the day

reviews.review_title: very black, but dries out fast.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this eyeliner is pitch black and great, but it dried up in about three weeks. i recommend sticking with the original stila eyeliner; that one is amazing!

reviews.review_title: The only liquid liner you'll ever need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best liquid liner.  I was using the regular stila and bought this on a whim.  I fell in love witht the microfine tip precision.  Ive got cats eyes for days.  I will buy this product forever and ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Stila liquid lipsticks, but this was a waste. I'm shocked at all the good reviews and things I hear about this liner. It dries up and stops working very quickly, and doesn't apply nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After hearing such great things about this eyeliner I was so excited to try it. However I was so disappointed with it. It was so dry and applied so difficultly. It was so dried out that it wasn't even black it was somewhat of a grey.

reviews.review_title: The only eyeliner I'll ever use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best eyeliner I've ever tried. It's the only one that actually stays on all day, doesn't smudge, and is ACTUALLY waterproof.   I've tried using other brands that also claim to be waterproof, but they all just wipe away or run down my face.  I don't know what it is about stila, but they're doing it right.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic eyeliner, stays put, smooth application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My life has been changed. I love this eye liner so much. It stays put. Flows across my eyelid beautifully. With the fine tip it is really easy to get a perfect little flick. I was hesitant to throw down this much but the ease of which it applies and STAYS put I'm sold.

reviews.review_title: Used to be my go to! Not anymore
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go-to eyeliner for YEARS. I'm unsure if they've changed the formula or what but it's been super patchy and not longer wearing as of late. I find it's smudged a few hours after applying it. It didn't use to be like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The micro tip is perfect for tightlining! I used an eyeshadow primer beforehand and applied it right above my upper waterline and this did NOT budge. I also used a lash serum prior and clear mascara on top and still this didn't smudge at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the original tip for years. However, sometimes I felt like it just went on too thick for days I wanted a more simple look or just a hint of an outline, especially towards the end of its life when the tip would start getting a little fuzzy, making it hard to work with cleanly. This solves all of those problems and I will definitely be buying this one moving forward. Makes it so much easier to do a super pointy cat eye wing.

reviews.review_title: Love the micro tip for the wing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the normal stay all day waterproof eyeliner for 10+ years now and when they came out with the micro tip I was super excited. It's helpful to use the micro tip to be more precise on the wing of the liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an oily- eyelid gal who loved the original stila waterproof eyeliner, I really wanted to love this. While the packaging and concept is very appealing, the liner itself was very watery and took multiple coats and still was not very opaque. I also found that this eyeliner spreads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best eyeliner I have ever used! True black. Goes on smoothly and lasts for days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really good tip but it's not waterproof when my eyes water it comes off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I don't like liquid eyeliner that are a pen. it dries too fast but my usual eyeliner was out of stock so I bought this one. Its been just a couple of weeks since I have that liner, but I can rate thst product. So it is very easy too use. and since the tip is so small, the ink goes to the top easily. Very good for small details. If you like to do complicated things with you eyeliner, its the one for you. I prefer this one at the other from stila for for the tip. But, even if it does not budge, it can be tricky to apply on eyeshadow especially mettalic and shimmery ones. I have to reapply the liner after it dries because it lost its intensity (for sure I apply the liner after the eyeshadow dont get me wrong).

reviews.review_title: Even better than the original tip!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After searching through many other (more affordable) liners I finally gave in and bought a Stila liner. I learned how to decently place a wing and got down to only needing a few to as little as one q-tip for my mistakes. I decided to try this one, as the larger tip can sometimes make it difficult to create a nice thinner line. This eyeliner tip is absolutely perfect and sturdy. If the formula is the same and the wear remains flawless, I might've just found my first Holy Grail makeup item! Definetly worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite eyeliner by far. It lasts all day, even when I cry, and it is never too thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I was purchasing a new Stila microtip because my eyeliner is getting dangerously close to the six month mark, I noticed the low rating and had to let everyone these dry out issues must have been duds because mine is still 100 % in perfect working order. I have a slight hooded eye and need thin precision. This Stila liner delivers the same patent perfection of the regular liquid eyeliner with smaller tip. I have had zero issues with dry out or tip failure, no other eyeliner can match stila, and I'm repurchasing. This is a five-star eyeliner. You guys have to know that I've tried others (Kat you're ok, but not Stila). Product failure has not happened for me.

reviews.review_title: Not a good eyeliner 0 stars if I could.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The liquid doesn't come out and it dries off quick. The tip is so sensitive it wears off. I've only used it four times and none worked for me. I have to press the tip on my hand in order for the makeup to come out. The eyeliner will not come out from the tip you have to use the thickest part of the brush in order to get product out. Also the eyeliner does not work well with foundation. I am using the Nars sheer glow.The felt tip picks up foundation and grabs on to it.The Kaja eyeliner has been my favorite felt tip eyeliner but it comes in a pack of two (the other eyeliner is a wing stamp).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for controlled thin lines. I used to use the regular Stila liquid eyeliner and purchased this one by mistake, but prefer it now!

reviews.review_title: The best friend out of all my make up products!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When they discontinued the Burberry Cateye liquid liner, a Sephora employee introduced me to this one. I love how this liquid eyeliner stays on all day (whether I choose to wear it with foundation or not)! It also comes off right away when you wash your face and doesn't leave any odd residue. Best of all- it doesn't contain sulfates or phthalates! I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent liner. It goes on smoothly, and the brush tip has the correct balance of stability and flexibility to work without too much of a learning curve. Like a lot of other reviews have said, the liner isn't 100% waterproof. If you put it on without priming, the color will wear off in areas where sweat will typically build up - but it isn't as noticeable as other liners and still lasts for a long time. If you aren't wearing shadow underneath the color will also look a tad thin on the first application. Otherwise, the brush and formula apply and perform well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have adored Stila Stay All Day Waterproof Eyeliner for years, but I have always used the regular tip. This time, I decided to try the Microtip and boy, am I glad I did! It's great for detailing, and it is very forgiving for making mistakes because you can just go over it very easily. I will say though, please be sure to *SHAKE* the pen before using! I almost returned it because my silly self didn't read the instructions. It makes all the difference! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FINALLY! Something that doesn't run or smudge. I do not touch my eyes, yet almost every water proof or not eyeliner smooshed and smudges between my eye lids. Stila Stay All Day is the first product that has worked for me since my previous favourite was retired. The tip of the pen is very thin and makes for great clean lines, great for tight lining as well. 10/10 I will keep buying. No more smudgy gross looking eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Saying this is my favorite eyeliner that I own would be an understatement. It is extremely easy to work with once you get a hang of it. I use this to outline the shape of my liner and fill it in with the regular sized Stila liner. This helps me have my signature sharp and sleek eyeliner. Can not go a day without using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this liner. You can read all the other raves to see why. My only quip is that I don't feel comfortable calling it fully waterproof. The shape of my eyes makes me experiment with different liner shapes that are... unconventional. They often surround the outer corner of my eye as in the attached picture. But after a couple hours, it starts flaking off because of the moisture in my eye. My eyes do water when I wear makeup, but it's not so much that there are tears running down my face, it's more of a slow leak. If you don't have that issue and you wear your liner entirely above the eye, this shouldn't be a problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is anything but u201cstay all day.u201d Buy Tarte's instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. I had been using KVD tattoo liner forever and decided I wanted to change it up. This liner was recommended to me by a Sephora representative and she was so right. I'm one of those poor women who insist on the winged liner look no matter how unsteady my hand is and this made it so much easier due to how fine the tip is. And it didn't even run or bleed after a long day at Disney (pre pandemic of course) which is always a 5 star product in my book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeliner to death. It stays on, and is as black as can be. The microtip makes application easier and you can change your look for dramatic or natural with less fuss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for so long and I love it! It stays all day and is so precise, and goes on so smoothly but it just runs out pretty quick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good application but the product is hard to get out sometimes and can be very scarce. I usually use this as a base and then fill it with another brand. I stopped buying this once I found my perfect liner, but I do recommend for long lasting formula. It does take a few tries to get it on

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo oily skin and my eyelids are typically pretty oily too. This never melts off my face or smears. Definitely a daily go to in my make up bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite eyeliner EVER! Been using Stila liquid eyeliner for years, but once they came out with this micro tip version I am even more in love. Perfect for precise, sexy wing tips and works great on my small asian eyes. Can build to thicker lines which is great for people like me who overdraw sometimes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Although the product in the pen is great, I'm not a fan of this tip. It's really thin, so if that's your thing then this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is perfect since the top is so small and fine. You can truly make a perfect winged eyeliner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a smaller eyelid space and this is PERFECT. It gives me a lot of precision to draw on thinner eyeliner and I make fewer mistakes with this compared to thicker brushes/felt tips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good pigmentation!! I prefer KVD Liner in Trooper!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really pleased with this. It was easy to apply with the fine tip for a subtle liner look, and stayed on all day :)

reviews.review_title: good but not what I need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good eye liner. it really is waterproof and hard to take off with your hands only touching it. but i was looking for the ticker one. this is so thin and small it was hard to draw on my eye and then filled it up. It's perfect to small details. it's a deep black.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good liquid eyeliner.  It's not completely waterproof, however it still performs great.  I have allergies and wear hard contacts so it's important to have the right eyeliner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeliner draws smoothly and has some wiggle room before fully drying and setting. It doesn't leak through and is waterproof which is good for rainy states!  I also plan to continue using this product even if the liner doesn't come out well by using it on my eyebrows. The precision is very good, and I have nothing but good things to say about this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the thin line that it makes, however when I applied to my other eye it seemed to have dried out. I shook it with the cap back on and tried again, still dry. idk if there is a trick to keep the liner moist...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST EYELINER EVER. I wear eyeliner every day, and I've used traditional eyeliners and gel. Usually I tear up a little when I laugh really hard, and my eyeliner always runs. This is by far the most long-lasting formula. I purchased it in the hopes of being able to wear it on vacation and not sweat it off, and it looks like I might even be able to wear it in the water (not getting fully submerged).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: won't wear any other eyeliner after trying this one! lasts all day and is extremely precise with the tiny micro tip. most other eyeliners end up laying on way too thick or while i'm applying, since i'm not exactly the best at doing eyeliner, ends up getting all over the place, but this one is super reliable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST liquid liner I've ever used. I have used both types of tips, too. I feel this one gives me more control of the size of the line, when applying it. I've purchased this more than once and will again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing liquid eye liner! The tip is such a genius idea and helps with perfecting the sharp wing tip!

reviews.review_title: my new favorite liner, great for hooded eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product I'm already ordering another one, this liners really micros in so it works perfect for hooded eyes or small eyes

reviews.review_title: All the good stuff in a small tip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's everything that everyone loves in a smaller tip. It dispenses the perfect amount of liquid to get a nice clean crisp line. Intense pigment saturation for a jet black wing or simple liner. The fine tip is great for graphic liner, pointed inner corners, cut a man sharp wing tip, or extra lines for a unique liner look. This is perfect for my small hooded eyes because I can get a perfect thin black line where I need it. great for a thin line to  hide lash bands when you dont want the liner to be the focus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Nice control when doing more polished looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner stays put all day long. It's easier to apply with the new micro tip for straight thin lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down this is the best eyeliner I've ever tried. I HIGHLY recommend it especially if you have oily eyelids like myself. It stays put all day and is easy to apply smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeliner. It does not smudge and I don't believe it is meant for winged eyeliner, it's meant for a more subtle, office appropriate, day-time look. It gives the perfect sized line and is my go-to liner now. I used to use the Kat Von D, but I got so sick of the thick line it would always put on my lid and it looked way too heavy and night-time for work. This is a great option for those who still want to look glam in the office while not wearing too much makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is definitely waterproof and longwear, i'll give it that. After spending the 25 minutes it takes to painstakingly apply winged liner with this applicator, the liner looks good and stays that way. However, application is this product's worst feature. The tip dries out after 20 seconds, a situation which requires you to scratch at the felt tip until product comes out again. Let's say you do get a solid, straight line to come out of this pen. You attempt to add on to that line, and it wipes away at it. For $22, I expected a much easier application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This micro-tip makes it SO much easier to make a wing. Doesn't bleed and looks really neat, easy to make even wings on both eyes, even if your eyes have occasional bags or are crepey. But I must add that to line the rest of my lids I use the Stila with the regular tip. I have found this to be the perfect combo. There doesn't seem to be a difference in the formula so they both blend together, it's just two different tips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this product in hopes it would do what it says it will do, to stay all day.   Sadly, no. As soon as I put it on, I wanted to readjust the angle of my wing so I rubbed it with a dry finger. It came off easily,  a little too easily,  so I reapplied and I waited 45 mins before trying to rub the liner with a dry finger and again it came off without so much as a tug!!!  I expect a liner to smear,  but not completely rub off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to stick with kat von d tattoo liner for years. Then I couldn't get my hands on that one and had to get this one for the time being. Holy cow am I glad that I had to make this switch!!! I'm never going back to kat von d's. This goes on amazing (I prefer the felt tip liners) and stays on all day. I'm a big girl and I sweat a lot, this holds up with no running at all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This works! I have tried many an eyeliner - pencil, gel, pen, pricey, drugstore - and they all smudged or ran when applied on the upper lash line. This one actually stays put! And removes relatively easily. Hooray! Also like the fine tip. Hope it doesn't dry up too quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This draws the most perfect winged eye and it stays on all day. The actual liner itself lasts forever too. I've been using the same one for about 3 months and I use it every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I draw this on in the morning and it stays all day. no pull or tug to get it on. Stila makes very good eye liner.

reviews.review_title: takes a LONG time to work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the regular Stila liquid eye liner so I decided to try the micro tip. I took a star away because it took a LONG time for this product to get going. To the point where I almost trashed it.I tried everything. Shaking it. Wetting the tip. Storing it upside down. After a week or two it finally started working properly and I love it. It's very dark and the lines are very precise. I wouldn't buy it again. I'll probably go back to the regular version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use the regular Stila liquid eyeliner but once I saw this I knew I had to get it to perfect my cat eyes. It works SO well to get those fine lines for whatever winged look I desire to do! Also it stays on, even after a long night out (and even the morning after! Haha). I'll sometimes use this for the outline of a wing and fill it in with the regular tip Stila. 10/10 favorite eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My One and Only eyeliner for the last 5  years, has never failed me and will continue to buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've bought this liner 4 times. The first 2 tubes were absolutely perfect - I loved the depth of the black, the precision, the staying power. They both lasted for months. Unfortunately, the last 2 times I've ordered it, it has arrived partially dried up. This makes it hard to apply and also makes it prone to crumbling/flaking off, which never happened with my first 2 tubes. IDK if this is an indication that the formula has changed, or if I've simply had bad luck and been shipped old product twice in a row. But for the price I expect better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with hooded eyes, it's insanely hard to find an eyeliner that suits me. Oh the sheer amount of eyeliners I've tried in my lifetime with no luck. I finally caved and bought this, while on the pricier end, I have zero regrets. I'm never ever going back to any eyeliner again. This is it my hooded eye friends. 100% recommended this to all of you. A+++ Stila!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe I'm an eyeliner idiot but I don't get it. This smudges so much. I even use setting powder on top and the second I open my eyes fully, it's created another line right below my eyebrow. By the end of the day it looks awful or is gone completely. I know this is a holy grail product for a lot of people so I wonder if I'm doing something wrong, lol. I also feel like not enough product comes out, I have to shake it over and over?  Pros: price isn't bad, I like the precision of the applicator tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best eyeliner ever! I was introduced to Stila eyeliner years ago. I've tried other eyeliners afterwards but this is hands down the best. It's very pigmented, easy to use and if you make any mistakes, it's easy to correct. This eyeliner lasts the whole day and doesn't smudge. The micro tip makes winged eyeliner super easy to do and doesn't look too bold. Stila is my go to eyeliner, I always make sure I have a back up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was playing soccer and a guy kicked the ball right into my eye while I was wearing this eyeliner (and SEPHORA Eye Love Eyeshadow Palette), and my makeup stayed totally intact.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this liner!! Stila has always been my go to for liner, haven't found another one quite like it. Especially because I don't have a lot of lid space. (Asian and hooded eye) small enough to make thin line and sharp enough for that winged! love love love! u2764u2764u2764

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this eyeliner because I needed something that would hold up during the musical I was performing in. HOLY SMOKES IT DOES NOT BUDGE. We just ended our run yesterday and even though I bawled like a baby, it didn't even run. No cracks, no smears. I love the micro tip because I don't have the steadiest hand. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  I buy it over and over.  Very easy to use.  It lines the eye very smoothly and is easy to control when wanting that very thin line.  It truly is waterproof/ sweatproof  but removes very easily and cleanly with a makeup remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! Best liquid liner I've ever used! It doesn't bleed or transfer. It gives a nice, sharp wing. Be careful when you put the lid on though! If you don't hear the snap then it's not on all the way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product. However there are things that I like and don't like. I like the tip, it makes the application of the eyeliner easy. The only problem, it leaves residues under my eyes. it can be anything but waterproof

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so much. And I do! The black color is great and I like the micro tip. BUT if you live in a climate where you sweat even the tiniest bit, it will transfer to your upper eye. I have to check the mirror constantly to make sure it's wiped off. I've worn it on days where I stayed inside and it was fine. Maybe during the winter it would be fine, but I live in Texas so I swear 95% of the year. This'll be a return for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't use eyeliner every day so this one has been lasting  for a few months now. I'm in love with micro tip. I have heavy eyelids so no matter how durable or waterproof eyeliner is it gets smudged very soon. This one allows me to draw very fine line close to my eyelashes. As a result it doesn't get smudged. It is 100% must have eyeliner for beauties with heavy eyelids like me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I get hot it smudges and messes up on my bottom eye.  The top eye will not stay on all days either.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for deep set hooded eyes!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner is perfect for my small hooded eyes. I love this liner, it was always impossible for me to line my lines as thin as I wanted before I got this liner. It is very pigmented and easy to control and truly has a very small tip. I have had this for over a year and still works like brand new.  Tip for small/hooded eyes: apply this liner in small strokes with your head backward and your eyes looking down at a mirror on the table- you will get better application than staring directly into a mirror on a wall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I HIGHLY dislike this eyeliner. If you go over an already marked spot it kind of erases what you had marked. It's not a good eyeliner and is probably the worst I've ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is exactly what I wanted, a liquid eye liner with a MICRO tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I spent the extra money to get something waterproof, but this doesn't last 10 minutes after I step outside. The second a tear forms on the corner of my right eye (thank you, ragweed), it's smeared or gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite eyeliner it won't budge and it last for hours. I loved the micro tip to give me a thin line and also I can used it in my inner corner.  I feel like have more control of the thickness of my eyeliner  using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smooth to apply love the thin tip the color is Rich like all of stila's eyeliners

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've consistently used this eyeliner for years now and I always keep coming back to it. I have oily monolid eyes and when used with a bunch of priming stuff, this stays on and doesn't smear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just as good as the iconic original, but if you're practiced with the regular tip, you can be almost as precise with it as you can with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: All time favorite eyeliner! Perfect for detail and fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A friend told me about this eyeliner. The sales women said people love it and that it was waterproof.  I may have applied incorrectly? But it melted off within 3 hrs. I didn't get to the waterproof part. The partial line on my eyes came off with soap and water. I was surprised that not a speck remained. It does go on easily and looks good, but it really just disappeared at the wing end.

reviews.review_title: Prefer micro tip over regular tip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love the micro tip. It allows me to build to the perfect width according to mood, and with precision. I accidentally purchased the regular tip last month and the difference in how much liquid comes out was astounding. IN LOVE with the micro tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the precision of this compared to any other eyeliner I own, but I do think the tip dries out/doesn't continue to distribute product during usage very well at times. Perhaps I'm not using it to its fullest potential but it especially starts to be troublesome if I'm trying to line over (dried down) liquid or glittery shadows. The texture seems to really cause issues when other thicker liners don't have the same problem. This happens with individual usages and then when I use it again the next day or so, it'll be okay to use like normal, so I guess I have to be a bit cautious with which eye looks I use this for. Overall, I love how fine it is though for that subtle flick and will probably repurchase when it fully dies out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not apply easily.  Almost had to poke an eye to get it to work, and when it did, not for very long.

reviews.review_text: I have monolids, which makes eyeliner extremely difficult for me, due to the lack of space on my eyelids. It doesn't smudge and ruin my eye makeup when I look open my eyes. I haven't had an issue with it running out of ink, and it's been pigmented enough to show up over glitter eyeshadows (you do have to layer, but not a ton). It lasts really well, and I used this for prom. Overall, I am extremely happy with this eyeliner and I find that it works really well for my eyes and my skin type. I love it so much.

This makes the tip drier, requiring me to press harder to deposit any color and defeating the purpose of the smaller tip (since pressing down causes me to make more contact with the lid). Otherwise, it is great for tightlining and for very fine details, if you can shake some product into the tip before you try to apply. Formula is just as long-wearing and long-wearing as the original!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use Stila smudge stick twist up liners and the original liquid eye liner. Only two liquid liners I use are Stila's and another brand. The reason is because I'm not so great at applying liquid liners. But with Stila I get such good control. So easy to use. Had to try the Micro tip. Love that I can get right at my lash line with this tip. There are times that I'm rushing in the am and later notice that I have a little gap where I did not line right at lash line. It's really not that noticeable but with the Mico tip I don't have this issue at all. And perfection for the inner corners of my eyes. I can get a precise thin line in inner corners using the micro tip. With this liner I have the option of going for a thinner or thicker line which I love. No issues yet with drying out nor dispensing color. Of course you have to shake the pen. Very precise line. Can get right at my lash line with even application, no smudging, no fading, lasting, easy control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

I love the Stila formula and will continue to only buy the micro tip as long as they keep making it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute go-to liquid eyeliner! I wear it every day and have never had any problems. The micro tip is seriously micro, perfect for a cat eye. I tend to range from a subtle cat eye for work to a bold cat eye ala Cleopatra for play. For a subtle look, this is perfect because the micro tip lets you follow your lash line flawlessly. For bolder looks, you may have to draw the top of the line then fill in the bottom closer to the lash line. Thankfully, with the micro tip, filling in gaps is easy and you never seem to get too much product like you might if you were using an inkwell style of eyeliner.   The color is intense black, but doesn't get that weird shininess you get from some other brands. I haven't experienced any flaking/chipping, though it can be prone to fading/smudging if you're like me and have oily eyelids but don't want to be bothered with a primer every day. When used with a primer or a little crayon eyeliner first, it stays for a full workday and then some (in the South Florida heat/humidity mind you!). I've even worn this eyeliner on the beach without it budging.  I've used both the Kat Von D Tattoo Liner and this one from Stila, and I have to say the Stila liner is much better. The color is a truer black imo, while the Kat Von D liner tends to be runnier and more translucent like a dark gray. I also haven't had any issues with the tip drying out like I had with the Kat Von D liner.  Some reviewers have mentioned that they have had problems with the tip bending, but I haven't had this issue and I use it daily and I'm on my second tube.  If you're between the micro tip and the regular Stila liner, I'd say go with the micro tip! It's better to have the option of a super thin line imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used various liquid liners in the past and I'm in love with this one, especially because the tip is so fine! It's very easy to apply, stays on all day with no smudges by the end of the day. Easy to take off with regular make up remover.
