reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations because of the good reviews but this eyeliner was so disappointing! It is so sheer that it requires multiple swipes but it does that annoying dry erase marker thing where if you try to draw on top it erases the line already there. It's also definitely NOT waterproof. It smudged and flaked off within an hour! For the price I expected better performance. Two stars for the teeny tip which I really liked and gave me good control and precise lines when the ink miraculously comes out opaque.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not waterproof. It bled everywhere after a couple of hours. It's nothing like the original eyeliner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the regular stila eye liner and really liked it, so I figured I would try the micro tip for finer lines. I had high hopes, but this is garbage. It dries out before I can even finish my eye. Stick with the regular packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it works perfectly for me i like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I see no point on the micro tip. I use the regular sized tip daily and it works way better than this one. This eyeliner does not give off enough ink either and I have to constantly keep pressing and drawing over my cat eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly wanted to love this eye liner but I'm so disappointed that it dries out too fast. I normally buy the original but when I went back into Sephora to pick up another eye liner the girl in there introduce me to the thin micro one and said it's so much better and that I would love how easy it is to draw my lines on. With no doubt I brought it, love it at the beginning but will with 4 days the tip started drying on me, I though something was wrong with the one I brought so took it back to exchange and explain to the associate what happened, she exchanged it for me only coming to find out it happened again within a week, the tip of the liner was dry and barley could get any ink to come out.. I'm going to return the eyeliner again, it's not good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works perfect for my eye shape... I have hooded eyelids, when I use this eyeliner you can still see my eye shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if I like it better than the original one, but the tip is very precise and my wings turn out sharp af. I usually use another liner for my lid then this one for my wing because the tip on this isnt as soft as it is in the original one but, in a pinch, thiisss could be used for both

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to eyeliner. I like to use it on the lashline to make my eyelashes appear fuller. No smudging. Stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg! I love how dark and perfect this liner is. I thought I would never find the perfect liner but here it is. It's very easy to create a great winged look. I'm never buying anything else

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think I love it. I asked for the advice of a person that works there and she didn't seem to listen much... but I think I'll be happy with this one. It's easy to use and thin looks pretty good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best liquid liner I have ever used! The tip is so precise but still can make a thick line. It's really great for getting symmetry on both sides and is such a good intense black! And it stays on all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best liquid liner I have ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love!!! I'm horrible at doing eyeliner and this is the only liner that won't leave me looking like a raccoon. I love the extremely fine tip, it makes it a breeze in my morning routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work outside all day in the heat and this liner stays on. I have also (accidentally) slept with it on and it has stayed perfectly in place. The micro tip makes it very easy to create the perfect wing.   I also use it in my water line on my top lashes. It creates an illusion that my eye lashes are thicker and it stays in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the past 6 plus years the only eye liner that I would use was the Kat Von D tattoo liner which, don't get me wrong, is great. BUT this eye liner is by far the best I have EVER used, the black is super pigmented and the micro tip allows you to make such percise crisp lines that you just can't beat it. This product is WORTH EVERY PENNY.

reviews.review_title: same great formula, even more precise
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was already in love with the formula in their other liquid liner pens, but this tip is a game changer! It cut the time it took to get a perfect wing in half! Absolutely in love with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The initial color payoff is nice, a deep black. But my wings slide off my face within a few hours. I thought it was just an issue with my skin itself and that I'd have to deal with it for life. Then I got a sample of a different brand and lo and behold, it stayed put all day. I know this is a HG for a lot of people and I hate to give it a bad review. But if you have oily skin, I would not recommend at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the micro tip on this eye liner! It makes it so easy to create a fine line for a subtle look or you can build it up for a more bold look. Other pens are too big and you always end up with a super big wing. This pen make it easy to create a dainty wing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the micro tip for a natural tight lined look. Stila still makes the best liner out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeliner makes a great, long-lasting line! Easy to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying this eyeliner, I didn't want to pay this much for an eyeliner but it is definitely worth it. It has become my favorite so far.

reviews.review_title: Where has this been my whole life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sephora employee recommended this to me. Love it! Precision point is amazing. Doesn't dry up fast like other pen liners. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great control and quick application. It is very pigmented. Using a face wash can remove it with minimal leftovers.  It was a little difficult to work with as the product does not go all the way to the very tip. I often have to use the side to get product on, leading to slightly thicker lines than intended. It is not very waterproof; a single tear anytime throughout the day can destroy the lining and you'll have to redo it. Also not smudgeproof.  Still a product that I will continue to use for the convenience of a micro tip liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first ever liquid liner, and I'm very happy with it. It glides on smoothly, has a fantastic color payoff, and doesn't run or splatter. It also stays put! Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best liquid eyeliner I've ever used!  Thinnest point, so you can build on it,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like how black it is and it helps with doing my wing eyeline but it dries and starts flaking :( I'll see if I can return it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not waterproof. It will rub off if you have watery eyes or if you swim in the pool. It smudges on my eyelid crease area. Bought this for the waterproof quality but at $22, this is not worth it. The tip of the tip runs out of pigment so it is hard to get a nice sharp winged tip. The only good thing i can say about this liner is that it has pigment at least, and the shape of the tip is not hard to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just as the name is, it really stays the whole day. It smudge a bit but so far this is the best eyeliner I've ever found.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wanted to love the micro tip since i wear winged eyeliner most of the time but ink only comes out of u til the pen sideways. so hard to reapply and touch up when you literally NEED the micro tip to get into small areas and nothing comes out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The regular Stila liquid liner is my absolute favourite, so I had to try this. I love it! It gives me so much more control. Right now I'm using the regular liner for the center of my eye, and the micro tip for the inner corner and wing. I think I'll switch to this one exclusively.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this product so excited because it said waterproof and that it last u201call dayu201d because my eyes have a tendency to water and always ruin my makeup. When I applied it. I loved how tiny it was perfect for getting the perfect wing. When I applied it, I felt like a dream gorgeous and left to work. Just like always my eye started to water an hour into the wear. when I look in a mirror my wing was gone. So no it did not last all day and no it was not waterproof. Maybe I got a faulty one? Who knows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is Amazing! I have hooded/oily lids and it didn't move at all but does come off easily with makeup remover... My new go to eyeliner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply. Lasts all day. Doesn't smudge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eyeliner it has a very small tip and does perfect wings! It barely smudges which is also a plus!

reviews.review_title: Easy peasy, no fail, long lasting! Works for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a terrific product for people looking for alighter touch with their eyeliner. Or if you aren't confident applying eyeliner this product delivery allows you to have a couple of stabs to create the look you are going for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Stila eyeliner is my absolute holy grail. I love how precise the tip is, and how much easier it makes winged liner. My biggest issues is that it can be a little difficult to fill in the wings sometimes because of how thin it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS LIQUID LINER! I have been on the hunt for the perfect liner and so far out of the numerous ones I've tried this one has by far been the best. The felt tip is a little shorter than what I'm used to but after the first swipe I got used to it. It stays in place all day and glides on so preciselely and is very pigmented. I find with previous liners I've tried, if I have moisturizer or product on my eyelids, I have to continuously swipe the liner on to get a precise and dark line. Not the case with this liner. Seriously love this product!! Would definitely recommend!! I had tested a swipe on my hand when I first got the product and the mark lasted all night, throughout continuous washings of my hands. Can't say enough good things!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it's great to draw under lashes to pretend you have fuller under lashes. very natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how waterproof this liner is.. but I can tell you that the applicator is the perfect size for detail work and a SHARP wing. My new favorite liner.

reviews.review_title: Start your liquid liner journey with this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I suck at using liquid eye liner. I have a hard time controlling the long tips. The ladies at Sephora recommended trying the micro tip and I have been using it every day. It is much easier to tightline and I have been able to get much better results with this. I don't do winged eyes so this is really good for just a nice, smooth line of liner. It lasts all day and I have not had problems with smudging. I have very sensitive eyes and have not had a reaction to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this product glides super duper well! since it is so think you can literally draw whatever you want on your eye! i love it sooo much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a slave to liquid eyeliner and the original Stila liner was my all time fave until I found this one! I like my cat eye subtle, thin and SHARP and sis this is IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is definitely a micro tip and will deposit very thin lines, however the tip is really prickly and stiff so you have to be really careful on how you angle it. It poked my eyelids a couple times and it was very pointy. The color is also not as intense and I had to go over it 3 times to get a dark matte black.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is not even intense. I have to go over it more then 2x to make it intense black. The ink doesn't come out easily. The only good thing is the micro tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I have the HARDEST time doing a winged eye. I have downturned eyes, and the corners of my eyes are slightly hooded. I've always envied the girls with almond eyes who can pull off the dramatic look, but the only wing that looks good on my eye is a very petite, subtle wing. I've never been able to pull off the winged look before this eyeliner, because I've never found a liner with a fine enough tip. But HUZZAHHHHH, in comes this liner and it's perfection. It's so small that I use it for just the wing, and I use a thicker liner for my lashline. Perfection. Stays put. If you're on the fence between this one and the Tarte micro liner, get this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this liner, though the tip is a little flimsy, with how thin it is, it seems like that's a trade off that has to happen. It does have a little learning curve because it is flimsy but I can get the sharpest wing ever! And of course the formula is the best, stays all day no problem! Definitely my favorite eyeliner ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this eyeliner because I needed a waterproof eyeliner. Because it's summer, the eyeliners I usually use keeps smudging and leaving black smudges under my eyes. This eyeliner saved me! I'm out for more than 7 hours and when I get home, there are NO SMUDGES at all!  The only issue I have with this eyeliner is, when applying with multiple of strokes, the brush wipes off the eyeliner that was already drawn. I don't usually have this issue when using an eyeliner that is not waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the micro tip!! Really helps achieve a sharp line!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mmmmm not my favorite. I actually thought I was buying the regular one and was intrigued when I uncapped and saw the tiny micro tip. Tbh I don't really care too much for this. Doesn't deposit as dark as the original one. Will be exchanging for the original this weekend. It's a nice option but doesn't suit my needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally hate the packaging, it's so ugly I almost didn't even try it. It looks like a cheap drug store eyeliner. I'm glad I did though, the product is awesome! They should seriously change the gold and black combination though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the original Stila eyeliner for years. It is my holy grail eyeliner, and I refuse to try anything else. It's extremely black and glides on opaque. So you are not having to build on top of it, to get a jet black effect like other that you have to build and build. So when this eyeliner came out and I saw u201cmicro tipu201d, I knew immediately it would be perfect for winged eyeliner. I can still do my winged eyeliner with the original eyeliner, but this tip is so small and precise that it practically does itself. If you love the formula of the Stila Stay al day eyeliner, and are looking for something for detail work this is a great one to pick up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are used to the original stick with that one this one is to small to work with

reviews.review_title: Stays all day but only lasts for 10 days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Started to dry out/ not work with in 10 days. Didn't even last through my vacation. I like the fine tip, but it should last at least a month! Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally love the precision of this pen and it lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ONLY use Stila liners.  They stay on ALL DAY and are easy to apply.  This new one is very thin, and I like it a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hated it, it doesn't last, messy and smears everywhere especially my upper eyelid. NEVER BUYING AGAIN

reviews.review_title: You dont NEED it but you'll be glad you have it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: VERY SHARP LINES! If youve been looking to get that perfect point on the end of your winged liner every time this lady is for you. A great addition to the eyeliner you already know and love or maybe something to use alone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner applies nice but it is not water proof. My eyes tend to tear from allergies and it literally disappears. After a full work day, whatever is left I can just simply wipe away with my finger. Really disappointing, I wouldn't buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough about this eyeliner. It is my holy grail liner, and I've come along way to say that. It's perfect, it lasts all day, and I can't use anything else after I've used this. As a matter of fact, I wrote a blog crowning it the liner of all liners: https://shopmintbeauty.com/2018/06/07/liner-of-all-liners/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite eyeliners. It literally stays put all day, just like the name suggests. I accidentally ordered the micro tip, which is fine, but I'd probably go with the regular tip next time. It's just super fine. I can make it work though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my favorite eye liner of all times and even BETTER in MICRO form! Long lasting and very smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner dried out. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this product, it stayed on all day if I primed and powdered my lids and I could draw the smallest lines. However a week in the product would be patchy as I drew my wings and if you tried to reapply liner over the line that was already dry, the liner would remove the black line underneath. I love the size of this pen, but I believe the original formula was better, I will not be repurchasing unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use style regular tip on a daily basis. The tip of the regular is too big, so I usually draw on my eyeliner with a fine pencil and go over it with the regular tip at the edges for a crisp look. I bought the microtip yesterday. I can control it much better than the regular and didn't need to use the pencil to get a controlled shape. However, the microtip tip doesn't give out much eyeliner. If I tilt the pen to apply the side of the tip, a lot of color comes out. Why isn't it going to the tip? Did I get a dud? This only happens to me with the regular size when the eyeliner is about to run out. I might exchange this to see if I just got a dud pen. But so far, I'm not impressed. If this produced ink from the tip, it would be an awesone product. But it doesn't so it's useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been a fan of the original stila waterproofs liquid liner since it would stay on all day without smudging along with its black pigment especially when I don't use a primer. When I used this a couple of times and my winged liner would be smudged after 6-7 hrs or wear. I enjoy that the tip is a lot smaller and easier to draw with but minus a star for it smudging. I probably would have to try a primer before wearing it to see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this. It stays on almost 8 hrs. I wish the pigment was a little darker. I feel like other black liquid liner is darker black, this is not a true black.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smudges after 2 hours and the color is not that intense. It's the second time I try stila eyeliner and the result is the same, I'm very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the original and really wanted to love this one too but the tip seems to be completely dried out! I can't get any product out of it. Maybe it's a dud? Sad to have to return it :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this everyday, it's so good!! It stays on all day  No smudges

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to wear this eyeliner religiously and buy it every time I ran out and it would stay on all day w/out smudging. The tip is perfect to do a winged cat eye. Unfortunately I've noticed lately it smudges a lot without touching my eyes. So sad I have to look for a new eyeliner :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed and am happy at the staying power of this liner. It lasted through one day of outside walk in 90 degree weather, an eye dr appt ( where they did all these tests on my eyes etc), and 2+ hours at the dog park. The only thing is the tip doesn't get enough product to it so hard to get a good cat liner. Cat eyeliner is the only reason I use and buy liquid liner so sort of disappointed because this product is almost perfect and great price point.

reviews.review_title: Best Eyeliner I have EVER used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It really stays on all day and even after swimming. It is so easy to apply. I don't think I will every buy another liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stila's Stay All Day Waterproof eyeliner was already my go-to for eyeliner - period! I couldn't wait to try this new micro-tip, and I was most certainly not disappointed!  It's wonderful! Glides on soooo smoothly, just as the regular tip, the staying power is incredible, and the micro allows for a much finer line and affords great control. Absolutely LOVE both varieties and will continue to purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is eye liner is a god send. Super easy to use, it's like you're using a marker to line your eyes. The precision is impeccable and you really don't need any other product but this one to create a dramatic effect. Plus, it lasts all day. It's amazing I wish I purchased it sooner!

reviews.review_title: Cry and rub your eyes to your heart's content
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Still the best waterproof liquid liner, although I wish they hadn't made the tip so fine. I prefer the older, slightly thicker version, but this still does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the microtip but mine keeps almost drying out at the tip... Like the bottom, if I dab it a few times, will refill with liquid, but it's going on pretty light...I basically have to use this one to make it look how I want it to look, and very carefully fill it in with my regular Stila liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really disliked this eyeliner. I'm a big lover of the regular top stila and I use it for years. However, the micro tip just didn't cut it for me.  The black wasn't dark enough and the color was patchy, the lines were so fine that I need to go over my lines several times to get the desired effect. I returned the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mine was dried up or something, had to return it. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the micro tip! It's much easier to line the inner eye. I wish it came in other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have hooded eyes and by the end of the day my eyeliner is on my lids. This eyeliner stays put!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the original Stila liner but sometimes I get frustrated with the thickness of line on my lid as I have hooded lids.  This was the answer to my prayers!  Same formula as the original Stila but with a slightly stiffer tapered tip!  Switching out my original Stila for this one for now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has definitely taken over as my favorite liquid liner! I've used and liked Stila's original liner as well as KVD Tattoo liner and Clinique's brush liner, and I've always preferred the rich black pigmentation and lasting power of Stila's formula but loved the speed and precision of a brush applicator. Though the tip of this liner is still felt rather than a brush, its size (roughly half that of the original) and good balance between flexibility and stiffness makes it just as easy and quick to get close to the lash line and to get a precise wing, which is a lifesaver for mornings that I'm running late (aka every morning lol). I'd imagine that this would be really wonderful for beginners or those who struggle with liquid liner/cat eyes, as well. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PROs: way easier to tightline than with the original, my tip used to slip and go straight into my eye, this is too short to slip CONs: so thin its actually a lot more work to get a good top line as you have to go over several times to get any significant width; a little stiff and very pointy making it pretty poke-y and prickly if ur not careful with your angle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Stila is my holy grail liner, period. In an attempt to save money I've been using a different, less expensive brand. I saw this product in Sephora a few weeks ago and was lured into buying it. Safe to say I forgot just how amazing the formula is (anyone who uses this eyeliner knows what I'm talking about). This stuff STAYS! And that's a big feat, since I have pretty hooded eyes, so if the formula isn't strong enough, I end up with an imprint of the liner on my upper eyelid. Also, the micro tip is AMAZING, especially for days when I'm riding the struggle bus hard to get my wings sharp and even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love the original Stay All Day liner, but wish that they've made the tip a bit smaller because you tend to over draw your liner, your prayers have been answered LOL.   I'll start by saying that the original Stay All Day and Kat Von D Tattoo liners are my two holy grail liners.  Both liners stay put all day long, even in extreme heat and humidity, rainforest type of weather.  I've always wished that these two liners would swap formulas sometimes because I love the intensity of the Stila liner, but the smaller, more precise tip of the KVD liner for drawing thin lines.  FINALLY!!!!  Stila have done it!!!  The formula is still the same as the original as far as I can tell.  Budge proof, stay all day!!!  Thank you Stila!!!!! I'll try to attach a picture of the original and micro tip liner so you can see the comparison.

reviews.review_title: Not sure how I lived without this before...

reviews.review_text: I've only ever used Stila's classic liquid liner because it is the holy grail of all liners, and now this new micro tip is a GAME CHANGER. I don't know how I've ever done my makeup without it! The formula is exactly the same fantastic formula of the original, but the applicator is super thin which makes it soooo easy to perfect a super sharp cat eye. I literally HAVE to use both now at all times! It makes every cat eye look perfect. Love this so much! And it's so great for lining super close to the lash line on the days that I don't want to go full glam. It's a MUST!
